price: 76. Tosalaki bango mabe te kasi bango moko nde bamisalaki mabe.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
